data.name: Burning Skies
data.detailed_description:
'Son, you are the last hope of the resistance to free the mankind from the claws of the General BLODMESTER and his terrible War Machines.'
BURNING SKIES is a frantic roguelite vertical shmup, with huge boss fights, tons of threats, weapons and a unique atmosphere.

GAME
Blast your way through danger filled tunnels, destroying warplanes and avoiding traps to reach one of the multiple boss fights in the game.
Beat bosses to unlock weapons power ups and new planes.


Story
Son, you are the last hope of the resistance to free the mankind from the claws of the General BLODMESTER and his terrible War Machines.
Their defenses are huge strongholds, built around entire cities and defended by traps and thousands of warfighters that are whiling to give their life to defend their master, getting through won’t be easy at all!
We’ll have to build the ultimate warplane and YOU are the chosen one to flight it!

Features
  • Multiple unique stages, each of them with a unique boss fight and enemies;
  • Procedurally generated runs with unique stages and boss fights picked each time;
  • Tons of unlockable weapons and power ups;
  • Beautifull atmospheric pixel art;

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DX10 or later
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
